title: Eowyn's Sword (4R272)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People

Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Possession • Hand Weapon
Strength:	+3
Game Text:	Bearer must be Eowyn. While you can spot a villager, Eowyn is damage +1.
